website_summaries.verdict: Customers needing an allergy-friendly pillowcase in a variety of colors should check out this inexpensive model.
pros: Buyers enjoy the vivid colors of the fabric and ultra-soft feel
cons: Many complained that the microfiber easily wrinkles
Fabric color may appear different than online picture

customer_reviews.title: So satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pillowcases to go with new bedding my husband and I bought, and I am impressed! The pillowcases were soft right out of the packaging - none of that crunchy new fabric feel - and the color was as vibrant as pictured on the site. They look fabulous! If the rest of their stock is as good as these pillowcases were, you can't go wrong with buying their bedding. I know I'll return to them when I need more. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Tia Mcpherson-werner

customer_reviews.title: The sheets are soft and comfortable. Their prices and fast shipping service was wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I not only purchased the pillow cases I also purchased 2 sets of split king sheets. The sheets are soft and comfortable. Their prices and fast shipping service was wonderful. They have a wide range of color choices I could not find in local stores. Although , there was a small issue with UPS losing one set of pillow cases, I was rebated the cost and a replacement came in a couple days. I would purchase from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Diane E Dickey

customer_reviews.title: The perfect choice.
customer_reviews.text: Had been looking for the longest time trying to find the brightest yellow pillowcases to be the final accent to a guest bedroom that I designed in a Batman theme - I found the perfect pair that is not only bright yellow but super soft and really makes the whole bedroom pop with that "POW" and "WHAM" of the beloved classic 1966 Batman TV Show. I am very happy that I finally found The Comfort Zone on Amazon as now I have exactly what I was looking for to make this guest bedroom extra special.
customer_reviews.author: Terry G. Connor - Dallas TX

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Th material is light-weight, it wrinkles out of the dryer, and the top of the pillowcase is poorly sewed. The fabric was hemmed, and folded over. The fold is only sewed on one side, leaving an extra flap that has to be folded in after washing and is a problem on a pillow. On the subject of washing, the color faded the fist time I washed it, not the point of looking old and worn, but the color is less bright, muddy. Based on the reviews, I ordered three different colors: red,blue, green. I'm sorry I did. I should have only bought one to see what the quality was. I won't be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT KIRK

customer_reviews.title: But they are beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Not the cotton pillow cases I was looking for. But they are beautiful and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not super soft and color was off to match sheets
customer_reviews.text: They are OK. They are a bit pricey, but I needed them to match the sheet set I got that only came with 2 pillow cases . Unfortunately they are not as soft as the original sheets, and are also a shade off and don't match even though they are the same manufacturer and series, so be careful if you are trying to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Low Price
customer_reviews.text: I've been sprucing up my bedroom a bit, lately, and I wanted to grab some new pillow cases to contrast the new colors I've chosen. I'm not a very picky person, so I was looking for the good deal rather than the highest quality. Before these, I had a big name, expensive pillow case on that I bought in a package deal with my whole bed set. I remember that sheet set being priced at a couple hundred dollars. These Nestl pillowcases are pretty comparable. My only dislike with it is that I thought the lines on the side were a bit more pronounced than they are in real life. Not a huge deal, though.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors offered
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors offered. I don't know how they wash yet if they hold their color. I will wash in vinegar the first time to set the color. They are thin material but that is what I like. They seem to be made well and fit the bed perfectly. I have a deep mattress and a topper and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Moen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pillow cases were good and worth the money. The color teal is a little difficult to match.
customer_reviews.author: looking for deals

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price. Soft !
customer_reviews.text: These pillow slips are okay. They are very soft but very thin & on the cheap side. I'll wash them on delicate & hang to dry otherwise I don't think they would hold up. I got them for our 5th wheel trailer so won't be getting used all year. I got the orange which is a pretty cantaloupe color. I would say they are somewhat lighter in color than the picture. I wouldn't purchase them again but for the price they will do.
customer_reviews.author: Pooh Bear's Mom

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered 2 sheet sets from this brand and just wanted some extra pillowcases. I bought the darker orange which has some brown in it. I really wanted something a little brighter but these are just to accent the teal sheets I had ordered. Washed and dried them and they are pretty much wrinkle free. Have not used them or the sheets yet but will see how they feel, and wear.
customer_reviews.author: zip*ee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Received these pillowcases a couple of days ago, and washed them today before putting them on my pillows. Terrible quality. One is ripped and torn, with the seams coming apart. Would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for the best sheets ever
customer_reviews.text: Order these pillow cases to go with an existing sheet set, to my delight they match my set perfectly and they're just as soft as the current set. I love the Deep eggplant color and the feel against my skin. I definitely would recommend these to anybody who's looking for a very luxurious purple with a soft comfy feel like a hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Cox

customer_reviews.title: Soft, no pilling, no weird stains or tears
customer_reviews.text: I own many items from this linen manufacturer. 2 duvet covers, 2 bed skirts and multiple sheet sets. Love! I was worried it would be cheap and pill and I haven't had a single problem! I have 2 dogs that shed like crazy and their fur doesnt stick to this after I've washed them which is awesome. With some cheap fabrics fur sticks but it slides off on this. Super super happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: 311CHICK

customer_reviews.title: not quite magenta
customer_reviews.text: I ordered just the pillow cases ro see how the quality would be. They washed well, and are in fact soft. I am concerned with the quality of the stitching and how well they will hold up over time. I wont be ordering the full sheets as a result. The color isnt magenta. It is more mauve.
customer_reviews.author: Jema Bish

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: These pillowcases are a good value, are indeed wrinkle free and they stay fairly cool through the night. I wish I had ordered a different color, as they are not the shade of green I envisioned. Also, they could feel softer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Taffet

customer_reviews.title: love these pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: The color is lovely. However, the real great thing about these pillowcases are they are as smooth as satin without being slippery. I am in my 60's and these are my favorite pillow cases ever
customer_reviews.author: Donna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t match sheets from same brand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow set along with the sheet bed set that nestl makes. I ordered the same color in both but the color is two different pinks. I thought I could just use them but it bothers me way more than I though. Other than that they are really soft. I’m just hoping somehow the ones I got where just a mistake, and that the next ones I get are closer or the same as the set. In the pictures: the lighter one is from this purchase the darker one is from the sheet set.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to care for!
customer_reviews.text: Needed extra pillow cases since we were expecting visitors who were staying a week at our home. Found these in a pinch and we love that they retained their softness through several washings since our visitors left. And with family members with sensitive skin, having hypoallergenic pillow covers is a must. Great product and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: natboosmom

customer_reviews.title: Nestl Microfiber
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous about switching from cotton to microfiber, but cotton sheets are so thin these days and wear out too quick for the price. Very happy with Nestl microfiber. Sheets are very soft and comfortable, and I haven't noticed them being too hot. And they are 1/3 the price of cotton! So far they have held up fine through a couple of washings.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Dec. 07.2019. Love them, just what I needed and the color is spot on. I just started using them a few days ago, will see how they hold up after a few uses and washes. Update Jan. 04.2020. They are really good pillow cases, holding up well so far. It's worth the try
customer_reviews.author: Be

customer_reviews.title: three out of four ain't bad
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I ordered these pillowcases. The first time one of the two wasn't stitched properly on one entire side. That left me with one. I needed another so I ordered again. Otherwise, they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Walters

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Pillow Case
customer_reviews.text: If we are talking level of softness, these pillows are great. If we are talking wrinkle-free... not so great. I find myself washing and drying them quite often due to how quickly they wrinkle. Color is great and just as described- a true deep navy.
customer_reviews.author: tabe

customer_reviews.title: These are RUST, not BURGUNDY
customer_reviews.text: These have 2 problems...#1-The color is not burgundy, it is rust with burgundy stitching which looks kinda weird. If not for the stitching, they'd go well with a set of rust sheets I have. #2-the decorative stitching and wide hem are only on the 'front' of the pillow. Very cheap looking. I'll probably return them.
customer_reviews.author: kk in nd

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Second set of cases from them, and have two sets. You can’t beat the colors, the softness and the PRICE ! I am a sheet freak, always looking for a better one. I have spent hundreds on one set and like these more. The only negative is they aren’t as deep as I need but neither were the Boll & Branch.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonlady

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but color is not as shown.
customer_reviews.text: So I love the pillowcase fabric...I bought the full set in white and also bought extra pillowcases in rust. The quality is wonderful, so comfy and soft and everything fits correctly! My only complaint is the color for the rust cases. It is not as shown, is it much more of a red than an orange, which is disappointing. But the product itself it actually really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and dust free.
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality. The pillow case is very soft and doesnt have dust come off it like some cases. It's a large pillow case so it can fit different pillows. Over all, I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and wrinkle free even after you lay on them
customer_reviews.text: The burgundy color looks faded..Not a fan of the color....I like the texture of them..They are not super soft and I like that...
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to match a sheet set I have on a guest bed. So far they have washed well and lasted. Everyone who has slept on them so far have complimented how comfortable they are have been! Color on one set matched the sheets exactly and the color on the other set (different sizes, same color ordered) came in a different shade.
customer_reviews.author: Melisac

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cases for extras. I have purchased several times for my business. I don’t like that the opening in the back is not stitched. That bothers me. It’s hard to make a crisp bed with your backend hanging out.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Love the true hunter green color and design on the edge of pillow case
customer_reviews.text: I have not washed the pillow cases yet, I always wash new linen and towel before use. The hunter green was as advertised and match a set of green sheets I owned for a long time. This was a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Best Sheets Ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest sheets we've ever owned. We used to spend hundreds of dollars for a single set at a popular brick-and-mortar store. These are more comfortable and stand up better, by far. Guests always comment on the sheets and ask what brand they are! We have them for all of our beds now!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Scar Fuston

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall excellent. I bought these pillow cases separately. They are labeled the same color name (camel gold), but the shade isn’t the same as the split sheet set of the same color name.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: these have become my favorite pillow cases.
customer_reviews.text: needed some new king size pillow cases for king size pillows what i use like body pillows. these have become my fave pillow cases. definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Scott

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness of these pillowcases. Originally I was looking for silk but after finding these, I forgot all about silk pillows. I wonder if they have sheets like this too.....
customer_reviews.author: JUDY A. PRATA

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how the envelope part is supposed to worK.....I like the pillow cases. They match my sheets exactly, and they stay on the pillow. They wrinkle way less that my other pillow cases.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Poor seams...
customer_reviews.text: Superior softness however the seams all crunch up after drying and the fold it's not stitched. I will keep them since I ordered them for a queen size pillow so I will fold them onto itself...
customer_reviews.author: gatormom2

customer_reviews.title: Go to place for necessities
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that I could get “extra” pillow cases for the colored set that I already had in the same color!! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: They are ok...
customer_reviews.text: The pillow cases are soft and pretty wrinkle free. However, some of the stitching came loose when I washed it and now they do not look as nice.
customer_reviews.author: D Heller

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace existing slightly faded pillow cases. The old ones looked better, more vibrant than these, so they just went in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: clantostheny

customer_reviews.title: Color not as appears but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I was going for, color-wise. Photo appears rust/burnt orange, so I purchased this to enhance our earthy-toned bedding. The bright orange didn’t match at all, but the quality seems good. I’ll keep them as spares for guest rooms, but I was bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as I would have liked, but I’m spoiled by flannel
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft as I would have liked, but I’m spoiled by flannel. My husband thinks they’re soft, but he has skin like sandpaper, so what does he know? They have strong elastic and deep pockets, Tao they don’t pull up.
customer_reviews.author: 1-800-buyaf**kinchicken

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the pillowcases 💯 It is very comfortable and yes it’s true it’s wrinkle-free and soft. Plus I love the color I got, literally looks like the picture! It’s worth it to buy these pillowcases!
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I liked the pillow cases but I ordered 2 sets the same color and received 2 sets a different color, it was obvious they were different! I kept them because it was to much trouble to send back. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: They are a deep dark rich blue and went really well with a comforter recently purchased. They washed up well and are nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: JMelissa

customer_reviews.title: Makes nice covers for kitchen chairs
customer_reviews.text: These made nice covers for my pair of white chairs. A little tight putting them on at the front of the chair but they go well with my kitchen color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie R

customer_reviews.title: beautiful shade
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect to add to my fall quilt as I'm not a sham person....and just the right shade
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The pillow cases are very soft and did not wrinkle when washed. They were smaller than I expected. If you have a bigger pillow it will not fit them. Also the inside of the outer opening on one side is not sewn down.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Maeyaert

customer_reviews.title: Colors not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Liked price. Average quality. Color WAY off from depiction. I ordered "Coral Pink", depicted as a deep pink shade, as I didn't want a bright pink like the "Fuschia". The pillow cases are a definite Tangerine color -- no pink about it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. MIller

customer_reviews.title: Pillowcases that are Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful color...beautiful feel and fit perfect for our king size pillows. In fact even have extra coverage for those pillows. Not short like some had said. Perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Long

customer_reviews.title: We love your pillow cases - they are Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: We love your pillow cases - they are Reasonably priced, soft and comfortable. We will be looking into buying more of your products. We are so pleased with our purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: TBear

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets and pillow cases are so soft immediately out of the package. They also don’t get too hot like I’ve had sheets in the past. I live in AZ so that’s really important. These are my favorite sheets I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Hlynch

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and the cotton is wonderful. So easy to wash. Plus, the inside of the pillow case How’s the gusset that holds the pillow into place. These are really great!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured n higher priced than competitors :(
customer_reviews.text: Not as Vibrant as color in picture. High priced compared to competitors. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: "webgirlonline"

customer_reviews.title: Sleep in soft and wrinkle free comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These pillow cases are exactly what I was hoping for. A perfect fit, soft and comfortable, and even the exact color of teal that I was searching for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pullin

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Have 3 sets of sheets. Wanted extra on pillow cases. They have pretty detailed trim also.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped when applying the sheets of same brand
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality of material as they ripped as I applied the sheets of the same brand to my bed. They are so soft though so it’s a shame they didn’t work out!
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Orange Rust is actually 'Orange'
customer_reviews.text: Too orange - I needed more of a rust color. Nicely made, just not the color I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine K. Trombley

customer_reviews.title: Rich color and SO soft!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these pillowcases! The color is SO rich and beautiful. I always wash things like this before I use them and no dye came off the cases in the rinse water. Super soft and we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Seraph

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant comfort!
customer_reviews.text: These pillow cases are completely worth it! The price point on them is already fantastic. But when you get them home they are beyond the quality that you think the price point is. I bought one set had it for a few days and my husband and I looked at each other and said we need another set. Reordered within under a week. The color is vibrant and they have washed well thus far. Don't think about it just get them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Monette Brann-Natta

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice!
customer_reviews.text: These pillow cases are wonderfully soft and fit perfectly; I’m glad I made this purchase. I wish the color had been slightly lighter, but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: ljschloss

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye Bol & Branch $150.00 sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the softest sheets I've ever owned, super generous in size, deep pocketed, at an amazing price! Will definitely buy again and recommend to family & friends!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Oh so soft!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these pillowcases. The color is a beautiful shade and is accurately represented in the pictures. They are very soft and held up well in the wash. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Juniper

customer_reviews.title: Shams?
customer_reviews.text: Was advertised as a sham but it is a pillowcase. Functional, wrinkle free, comfortable but very flimsy. It’s works well for a guest room that’s not used often. Color is true.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Mathewson

customer_reviews.title: True to description ❤😘
customer_reviews.text: The pillow cases arrived on time and in good condition. I ordered two pair teal green and silver. I absolutely live these pillow cases the color is perfect for my bedroom bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Very soft. Material durable. Only complaint is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. Material durable. Only complaint is that color is slightly lighter than pictured and definitely more matte looking. Not shiny at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can recommend
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertized, very pleased especially with the yellow color: it's exactly as shown
customer_reviews.author: LSM Florida,

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets! I was so nervous to order sheets online without being able to feel them first, but these are fabulous. They are incredibly soft, they appear well made, and they are super comfy. The only drawback I saw, is that the extra pillowcases I ordered that were the same listed color, are actually a different shade. (I ordered the Charcoal Grey)
customer_reviews.author: LexxiLexxi

customer_reviews.title: Cushy
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Cushy pillows. Not for firm support. Placed in guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Color difference
customer_reviews.text: The pillowcases state burgundy however they are more of a dark rust color. Even though they will not be perfect in my burgundy and hunter Christmas bedroom, I will use them elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: MKZ

customer_reviews.title: Not the color expected...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, but the color is nowhere near mocha. It’s more of an Auburn (Red/brown/orange). Little upset the color isn’t what it says it was.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth.
customer_reviews.text: These pillow cases are soft and silky smooth. The color I ordered was exactly as shown in the picture. I've washed them a couple of times and they come from the dryer wrinkle free. So happy with these. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: mjkusiek

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: These are soft to the feel and are nice to sleep on. So far they are holding up as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE COLOR IN PHOTOS
customer_reviews.text: NOT THE COLOR IN THE PHOTOS!!!! The color is definitely a bright orange lol not even close!!!! I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney Lance

customer_reviews.title: Color is less saturated than photos
customer_reviews.text: Pretty soft and comfy but color was much lighter than in the pictures :( ordered a pretty light blue but in person they pretty much look white
customer_reviews.author: Anekah Henson

customer_reviews.title: More Than Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: The color doesn’t exactly match the set I have that didn’t sell separate pillow cases but it’s good enough. They don’t feel quite as silky but thy’re good enough. Their ‘anti night sweat’ performance is more than good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Judy P.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty,soft cases
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as shams over my print summer bedspread. They have the nice decorative detail and the closed edge so they suit well for the purpose. The softness of he material means they are not "crisp" looking.But they are great for napping.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: I love those, and I've ordered more. They are very soft, feel cool, hardly wrinkle, and wash well.
customer_reviews.author: ELKE ALTMAN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest pillowcases I have ever owned! In addition, they fit nicely and the pillows actually stay in them rather that slipping out
customer_reviews.author: Dawn GROH USA

customer_reviews.title: Softness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket in other colors and really love how soft it is!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, and
customer_reviews.text: soft to sleep on. Make sure U like your pillow. That's where comfort comes into play.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these super soft pillow cases for my Mom. She loves them! Planning to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: lisa lloyd

customer_reviews.title: pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: got the coral color, just what i wanted. lovely material and fast delivery service
customer_reviews.author: vicki s jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have the sheets in Same color and gave them all very soft and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Sher R

customer_reviews.title: Color was off, but I still like them
customer_reviews.text: I got the orange rust pillow cases. Warning: they are much brighter than pictured. Still comfy though.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Pennell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for our Tempurpedic
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for sheets that would fit our Tempurpedic on an adjustable frame. These sheets are gigantic for our mattress, so they are baggy, which is not what I want at all. On top of that, they slipped off the corner of the mattress the first night! Will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: L. D.

customer_reviews.title: Pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: There very soft and it came fast.. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennzz1776

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, soft
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, soft, and pretty. Perfect for my needs. Envelope closure creates a clean look. Color is a little more bright and green than pictured, which is what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: nice, soft pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: nice, soft pillowcases, and good price. but the "charcoal grey" color looks kinda greenish in person, and didn't look good with other grey stuff. so, they will be backup pillowcases :-)
customer_reviews.author: Genna B.

customer_reviews.title: Love these pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: After reading some negative reviews I was reluctant to order these pillow cases! However, for the low price I’ll give them a try. I love them! They fit my king size pillows perfectly with extra fabric to cover the open end. I love the purple color and they are super soft and washed up great! For the price you can’t go wrong! Glad I disregarded all the negative reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: The softest pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: These pillowcases are sooooo soft and comfy! they are a little thinner than most pillow cases I’ve used but I love how soft and breathable the fabric is. Bought these in multiple colors now, well worth it and they hold up after multiple washes!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the quality of these as they were inexpensive, but I have been pleasantly surprised!! Very soft and I love the flaps at the ends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: Like the pillow case, but the color did not match the sheet set I bought that was suppose to be the same exact color. These pillow cases were a lighter color
customer_reviews.author: Marie Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Color deception
customer_reviews.text: The cover is very nice and comfortable, a little warm and larger in size but works great for us. I have not washed it yet so not sure about cleaning. Was not happy with the color received, nothing like the picture indicated, much lighter in color not vibrant but happy other than that. Sheets and pillow cases are easy to care for, fold nice and no wrinkles, easy wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These sheets felt great straight out of the box although I did wash ...
customer_reviews.text: These sheets come as advertised, very soft to the touch. I have eczema and I'm very sensitive to the feel of the sheets I use. These sheets felt great straight out of the box although I did wash once before use. I've had them about a month and they are holding up well so far, washing once a week. I purchased on the day of a special sale, but even at regular price it's a good deal. I'll probably pick up another set.
customer_reviews.author: lecty fream

customer_reviews.title: Color not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a mint green. The color I received was a bright pukie yellow green. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Roxzilla

customer_reviews.title: These pillow cases are extremely comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: These pillow cases are extremely comfortable and soft. However the color is off. In the picture, this shade of blue looks like robin egg blue. They are very, very light blue, just a few shades up from white.
customer_reviews.author: abc

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nothing. they are way too small for my queen size pillows. I will never use them
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillowcases. When we buy new sheets they only come with two pillowcases and we use more pillows than that. This purchase was to give us some spares. Quality is great and color is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillowcase.
customer_reviews.text: Looked just like the picture. Have a nice feel. Displays well as a very nice pillow case. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Marien

product_meta.title: Nestl Bedding Solid Microfiber Queen/Standard 20 x 30 Inches Pillowcases, Charcoal Grey (Set of 2)
feature_bullets: SOFT HYPOALLERGENIC PILLOWS: Our hypoallergenic pillow cases are woven from the highest quality microfiber material, double brushed on both sides for ultimate softness and comfort. Lightweight, breathable and cool to the touch, our luxuriously soft pillow cases will create a serene sleeping experience, leaving you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

QUEEN/STANDARD SIZE: 2-piece set includes two pillow cases. Queen/Standard pillow case measures 20” x 30” with back overlap envelope closure for an elegant, seamless look. Also available in King size.

LIKE SLEEPING ON A CLOUD: Softer and more durable than Egyptian cotton pillow cases, our 1800 double brushed microfiber pillow cases are breathable and hypoallergenic with a soft feel to comfort your face. Our fabulous selection of vibrant colors won’t fade after washing and are a beautiful, elegant way to update your bedroom.

EASY CARE & CLEANING: Machine washable in cold water and tumble dry on low. Fade, stain, shrink and wrinkle resistant. Our pillow cases get softer with each wash and they are wrinkle free with no ironing necessary, as well as hypoallergenic, anti-bacterial, environmentally friendly and resistant to dust mites.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Welcome to the Nestl Bedding family! Every purchase includes a 100% money-back satisfaction guarantee. Our #1 goal is to provide you with unparalleled customer service and we’re only happy if our customers are happy! Shop with confidence because no matter what, we’ve got you covered!
